programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Enterprise rescues the captain of a broken-down freighter, only to become involved in a dispute between feuding worlds--each demanding custody of their guest.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Enterprise responds to a request for medical assistance from Dr. Ira Graves, considered by many to be the greatest living mind in the universe.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The crew ferries a deaf mediator to Solais V to negotiate an end to a civil war.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Enterprise is en route to Star Station India when received a distress signal from the USS Lantree, a Federation supply ship. When they arrive, they find everyone aboard the Lantree of what seems to be old age.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When the Federation promotes an officer exchange program, Commander Riker decides to accept an assignment aboard a Klingon war ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Data resigns his commission rather than be dismantled for examination by an inadequately skilled scientist, a formal hearing is convened to determine whether Data is considered property without rights or is a sentient being.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ens. Wesley Crusher suffers from the pangs of first love when the Enterprise is tasked to transport a young woman, Salia, back to her home where she is to become the leader of her people.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Picard and the Enterprise respond to a distress call from its sister ship the USS Yamato. It has been facing a number of serious technical glitches and they lost 18 crew members when the containment field on a shuttle failed.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When the Enterprise is advised by a passing Klingon vessel that there is strange debris in orbit around a nearby planet, they investigate only to find a piece of a NASA spacecraft emblazoned with the US flag.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Deep in space, the Enterprise comes across a Federation shuttlecraft that is floating in space and without much power but which does exhibit the life signs of one human aboard.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riker's delight at being offered command of the USS Aries turns to frustration when the man sent to prepare him for his mission is his estranged father; Worf's behavior leads Wesley to delve into Klingon tradition.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: On arriving at a newly identified planetary group, the crew finds that the entire system is unstable.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Q tries to prove that Picard needs him as part of their crew by hurling the Enterprise 7,000 light-years away from where they encounter the Borg for the first time.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series
programme.desc: MacLeod arrives in France, leaving a trail of hate and destruction in his wake.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series
programme.desc: Kassim, an Immortal to whom Duncan made a promise, demands that MacLeod assassinate a tyrannical dictator of a Middle Eastern country.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A woman discovers that the floor of a department store, on which she bought a gold thimble, doesn't exist - and that her 'saleslady' is really a mannequin!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A scientist arranges to have his human-looking robot pitch for the struggling local baseball team.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A playwright makes characters come to life.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pilot of a downed WW II bomber comes to in the African desert and desperately tries to find out what happened to the rest of his crew.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A luckless couple stumbles upon fortune when a genie materializes from a bottle in their antique shop. The genie grants them four wishes but warns them, prophetically, to be careful what you wish for.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Small time criminal Jackie Rhoades must face both his past and his conscience while waiting for his next assignment.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Bartlett Finchley's paranoia about the machines around proves true.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Seeking refuge from a storm, traveler David Ellington comes upon a bizarre hermitage of monks, who have imprisoned a man who begs for his help. When David confronts the head monk Brother Jerome, he is told that the man is the devil, and David must decide

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Crichton falls into a wormhole and meets up with a strange man who shows Crichton the consequences of wormhole travel.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: After accidentally returning to Earth, Crichton discovers he is in 1985 and he has altered the timeline.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Crichton has arrived on Earth. Even though the Moya crew relaxes on Earth and are treated as VIPs, Crichton can't seem to adjust to life on Earth.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Moya takes on a new passenger, Talikaa. However, Talikaa turns out to be an alien in disguise and is intent on harvesting the crew's neural energy.

programme.title: Flood
programme.desc: Meteorologist Leonard and his estranged Marine son (Robert Carlyle, "Trainspotting") are caught up in a freak North Sea superstorm that floods London.

programme.title: Flood
programme.desc: Brought together at the Thames Barrier, Leonard and Rob are flung apart again by the elements. The two meet clumps of survivors as they journey upstream to Central London.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a father is gunned down in a parking lot by a killer lying in wait. In Mobile, an elderly man dies from a suspicious fire in his apartment.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: When a man is found shot dead in his driveway, an abandoned truck leads Tulsa Homicide to several potential suspects, but not everything is as it seems.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a father of three is gunned down in front of his family during a deadly crime spree. Detectives race to track down his killer before anyone else gets hurt.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: In Atlanta, when a young father is found dead in his home by his girlfriend, detectives track down the killer and find things are not as they appear. In Tulsa, a teenager is fatally shot, sending the Tulsa team on a desperate search for the motive.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a homeless man is beaten and stabbed to death, leading detectives to witnesses that live under the bridge where he was discovered.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: A young woman in Mobile is found dead behind an abandoned building, and detectives need her boyfriend to help solve the case. A young father's murder case sends Atlanta detectives to the Poconos Mountains in search of his killers.
